name: Silent Install Helper
short_description:
Silent Install Helper define the type of installer and allows you to automatically install applications, installers who have the ability to "silent" installation (ie without user interaction).
Supports Installer types: Inno Setup, Smart Installer,Wise installer, Nullsoft NSIS installer, RAR\ ZIP\7z\7z Setup\Free  Arc\Microsoft Cab SFX,  Msi, Ghost Installer Wizard, InstallAware Wizard, InstallShield, Setup Factory  Installer, Install4j Wizad,Draver Genius Installer and others.
